name: Lost Defender Prototype
description:
A love letter to Space Invaders, this space shoot em up will see you fighting space ships with a slow methodical laser. Your laser will actually lower your score every time you fire, promoting skilled shots.  

Future possibilities:

  • More enemies / bosses
  • More upgrades (including controlling multiple ships)
  • Temporary power ups
  • More exciting backgrounds and levels
  • World map
  • Random story encounters
